verses.verse: In <WG1722> those<WG1565> days<WG2250>, when there was<WG5607> again a great<WG3827> multitude<WG3793>, and<WG2532> they had<WG2192> nothing<WG3361> to eat<WG5315>, he<WG2424> called<WG4341> unto him his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, and saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>,

I have<WG4357> compassion<WG4697> on<WG1909> the multitude<WG3793>, because<WG3754> they continue with<WG4357> me<WG3427> now<WG2235> three<WG5140> days<WG2250>, and<WG2532> have<WG2192> nothing<WG5101> to eat<WG5315>:

and <WG2532> if<WG1437> I send<WG630> them<WG846> away<WG630> fasting<WG3523> to<WG1519> their<WG846> home<WG3624>, they will faint<WG1590> on<WG1722> the way<WG3598>; and<WG1063> some<WG5100> of them<WG846> are come<WG2240> from far<WG3113>.

And <WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> answered<WG611> him<WG846>, Whence<WG4159> shall one<WG5100> be able<WG1410> to fill<WG5526> these<WG5128> men with bread<WG740> here<WG5602> in<WG1909> a desert place<WG2047>?
And <WG2532> he asked<WG1905> them<WG846>, How many<WG4214> loaves<WG740> have ye<WG2192>? And<WG1161> they said<WG2036>, Seven<WG2033>.

And <WG2532> he commandeth<WG3853> the multitude<WG3793> to sit down<WG377> on<WG1909> the ground<WG1093>: and<WG2532> he took<WG2983> the seven<WG2033> loaves<WG740>, and having given thanks<WG2168>, he brake<WG2806>, and<WG2532> gave<WG1325> to<WG3101> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, to<WG2443> set before<WG3908> them<WG2532>; and they set<WG3908> them before<WG3908> the multitude<WG3793>.
And <WG2532> they had<WG2192> a few<WG3641> small fishes<WG2485>: and<WG2532> having blessed<WG2127> them<WG2036>, he commanded to set<WG3908> these also<WG2532> before<WG3908> them<WG846>.
And <WG2532> they ate<WG5315>, and<WG2532> were filled<WG5526>: and<WG2532> they took up<WG142>, of broken<WG2801> pieces that remained<WG4051> over<WG2033>, seven baskets<WG4711>.
And <WG1161> they<WG5315> were<WG2258> about<WG5613> four thousand<WG5070>: and<WG2532> he sent<WG630> them<WG846> away<WG630>.
And <WG2532> straightway<WG2112> he entered<WG1684> into<WG1519> the boat<WG4143> with<WG3326> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, and came<WG2064> into<WG1519> the parts<WG3313> of Dalmanutha<WG1148>.

And <WG2532> the Pharisees<WG5330> came forth<WG1831>, and<WG2532> began<WG756> to question<WG4802> with him<WG846>, seeking<WG2212> of<WG3844> him<WG846> a sign<WG4592> from<WG575> heaven<WG3772>, trying<WG3985> him<WG846>.

And <WG2532> he sighed deeply<WG389> in<WG4151> his<WG846> spirit<WG4151>, and saith<WG3004>, Why<WG5101> doth<WG1934> this<WG3778> generation<WG1074> seek<WG1934> a sign<WG4592>? verily<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, There shall<WG1325> no<WG1487> sign<WG4592> be given<WG1325> unto<WG1074> this<WG3778> generation<WG1074>.
And <WG2532> he left<WG863> them<WG846>, and again<WG3825> entering<WG1684> into<WG1519> the boat<WG4143> departed<WG565> to<WG1519> the other side<WG4008>.
And <WG2532> they forgot<WG1950> to take<WG2983> bread<WG740>; and they<WG2192> had not<WG3361> in<WG1722> the boat<WG4143> with<WG3326> them<WG1438> more than one<WG1520> loaf<WG740>.
And <WG2532> he charged<WG1291> them<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Take heed<WG3708>, beware<WG991> of<WG575> the leaven<WG2219> of the Pharisees<WG5330> and<WG2532> the leaven<WG2219> of Herod<WG2264>.
And <WG2532> they reasoned<WG1260> one<WG4314> with another<WG240>, saying<WG3004>, We<WG3754> have<WG2192> no<WG3756> bread<WG740>.

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> perceiving<WG1097> it saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Why<WG5101> reason ye<WG1260>, because<WG3754> ye<WG1260> have<WG2192> no<WG3756> bread<WG740>? do ye<WG3539> not yet<WG3768> perceive<WG4920>, neither<WG3761> understand<WG4920>? have ye<WG2192> your<WG5216> heart<WG2588> hardened<WG4456>?
Having <WG2192> eyes<WG3788>, see ye<WG991> not<WG3756>? and<WG2532> having<WG2192> ears<WG3775>, hear ye<WG191> not<WG3756>? and<WG2532> do ye<WG3421> not<WG3756> remember<WG3421>?

When <WG3753> I brake<WG2806> the five<WG4002> loaves<WG740> among<WG1519> the five<WG4002> thousand<WG4000>, how many<WG4214> baskets<WG2894> full<WG4134> of broken pieces took ye up<WG142>? They say<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Twelve<WG1427>.

And <WG1161> when<WG3753> the seven<WG2033> among<WG1519> the four thousand<WG5070>, how many<WG4214> basketfuls<WG4711> of<WG4138> broken pieces<WG2801> took ye up<WG142>? And<WG1161> they say<WG2036> unto him<WG2033>, Seven.
And <WG2532> he said<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Do<WG4920> ye not<WG3756> yet<WG4459> understand<WG4920>?

And <WG2532> they come<WG2064> unto Bethsaida<WG966>. And<WG2532> they bring<WG5342> to<WG1519> him<WG846> a blind man<WG5185>, and<WG2532> beseech<WG3870> him<WG846> to<WG2443> touch<WG680> him<WG846>.

And <WG2532> he took<WG1949> hold of the blind man<WG5185> by the hand<WG5495>, and brought<WG1806> him<WG846> out of<WG1854> the village<WG2968>; and<WG2532> when he had spit<WG4429> on<WG1519> his<WG846> eyes<WG3659>, and laid<WG2007> his hands<WG5495> upon him<WG846>, he asked<WG1905> him<WG846>, <WG1487> Seest<WG991> thou aught<WG5100>?
And <WG2532> he looked up<WG308>, and said<WG3004>, I see<WG991> men<WG444>; for I behold them as<WG5613> trees<WG1186>, walking<WG4043>.

Then <WG1534> again<WG3825> he laid<WG2007> his hands<WG5495> upon<WG1909> his<WG846> eyes<WG3788>; and<WG2532> he<WG846> looked<WG308> stedfastly<WG4160>, and<WG2532> was restored<WG600>, and<WG2532> saw<WG1689> all things<WG537> clearly<WG5081>.
And <WG2532> he sent<WG649> him<WG846> away<WG649> to<WG1519> his<WG846> home<WG3624>, saying<WG3004>, Do not<WG3366> even enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> the village<WG2968>.

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> went forth<WG1831>, and<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, into<WG1519> the villages<WG2968> of Caesarea<WG2542> Philippi<WG5376>: and<WG2532> on<WG1722> the way<WG3598> he asked<WG1905> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, saying<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Who<WG5101> do<WG3004> men<WG444> say<WG3004> that I<WG3165> am<WG1511>?
And <WG1161> they told<WG611> him<WG2491>, saying, John the Baptist<WG910>; and<WG2532> others<WG243>, Elijah<WG2243>; but<WG1161> others<WG243>, One<WG1520> of the prophets<WG4396>.

And <WG2532> he<WG846> asked<WG3004> them<WG846>, But<WG1161> who<WG5101> say<WG3004> ye<WG5210> that I<WG3165> am<WG1511>? <WG1161> Peter<WG4074> answereth<WG611> and<WG1161> saith<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Thou<WG4771> art<WG1488> the Christ<WG5547>.
And <WG2532> he charged<WG2008> them<WG846> that<WG2443> they should tell<WG3004> no man<WG3367> of<WG4012> him<WG846>.

And <WG2532> he began<WG756> to teach<WG1321> them<WG846>, that<WG3754> the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> must<WG1163> suffer<WG3958> many things<WG4183>, and<WG2532> be rejected<WG593> by<WG575> the elders<WG4245>, and<WG2532> the chief priests<WG749>, and<WG2532> the scribes<WG1122>, and<WG2532> be killed<WG615>, and<WG2532> after<WG3326> three<WG5140> days<WG2250> rise again<WG450>.
And <WG2532> he spake<WG2980> the saying<WG3056> openly<WG3954>. And<WG2532> Peter<WG4074> took<WG4355> him<WG846>, and began<WG756> to rebuke<WG2008> him<WG846>.

But <WG1161> he turning about<WG1994>, and<WG2532> seeing<WG1492> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, rebuked<WG2008> Peter<WG4074>, and saith<WG3004>, Get thee<WG5217> behind<WG3694> me<WG3450>, Satan<WG4567>; for<WG3754> thou mindest<WG5426> not<WG3756> the things<WG3588> of God<WG2316>, but<WG235> the things<WG3588> of men<WG444>.

And <WG2532> he called<WG4341> unto him the multitude<WG3793> with<WG4862> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, and said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, If any man would<WG2309> come<WG2064> after<WG3694> me<WG3450>, let him deny<WG533> himself<WG1438>, and<WG2532> take up<WG142> his<WG846> cross<WG4716>, and<WG2532> follow<WG190> me<WG3427>.

For <WG1063> whosoever<WG302> would<WG2309> save<WG4982> his<WG846> life<WG5590> shall lose<WG622> it<WG846>; and<WG1161> whosoever<WG3739> shall lose<WG622> his<WG846> life<WG5590> for<WG1752> my sake<WG1700> and<WG2532> the gospel<WG2098>'s shall<WG3778> save<WG4982> it<WG846>.
For <WG1063> what<WG5101> doth it profit<WG5623> a man<WG444>, to<WG1437> gain<WG2770> the<WG2889> whole<WG3650> world<WG2889>, and<WG2532> forfeit<WG2210> his<WG846> life<WG5590>?
For <WG2228> what<WG5101> should<WG1325> a man<WG444> give<WG1325> in exchange for<WG465> his<WG846> life<WG5590>?

For <WG1063> whosoever<WG302> shall be ashamed<WG1870> of me<WG3165> and of<WG2532> my<WG1699> words<WG3056> in<WG1722> this<WG3778> adulterous<WG3428> and<WG2532> sinful<WG268> generation<WG1074>, the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> also<WG2532> shall<WG1870> be ashamed<WG1870> of him<WG846>, when<WG3752> he cometh<WG2064> in<WG1722> the glory<WG1391> of<WG3962> his<WG846> Father<WG3962> with<WG3326> the<WG32> holy<WG40> angels<WG32>.
